entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Gift Card
Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

entry.title: Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle Large - 104 Puzzle Pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding Guest Book
Price: 44.99 - 53.49 (4 variants)

Unique Wedding Guest Book Idea. Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle Guest Book from Your Engagement Photo is a Beautiful Wedding Guest Book Puzzle with over 100 Large Puzzle Pieces.

Our Very Large Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle is a beautiful puzzle that features large puzzle pieces.  Measuring approximately 16" x 20" (inches) when assembled, this puzzle is a favorite among our customers for it's extra large puzzle pieces and professional look, as we print on a premium matte paper to create your beautiful puzzle...

Perfect for Wedding Family Portraits, the large pieces show great detail in photographs and look amazing framed.   

 

Our 104 piece features pieces that average 1.5 x 2 inches, perfect for even those long signatures.

entry.title: Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle With 104 Pieces - A Fun Family Portrait Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 44.99 - 54.99 (4 variants)

Your photo on our Very Large Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle.     This beautiful custom puzzle features 104 very large puzzle pieces.  Measuring approximately 16" x 20" (inches) when assembled, this custom puzzle is a favorite among our customers for its extra-large puzzle pieces and professional look, as we print on a premium matte paper to create your beautiful puzzle.

The large pieces in this completely personalized puzzle show great detail in the puzzle pieces and look amazing framed. Our 104 piece puzzle is perfect for Family Portraits and Alzheimer's and Dementia patients.    

If you are looking for a gift for the hard to buy for person, look no further.  This personalized photo puzzle makes an unbelievable Birthday, Anniversary, Graduation, Special Occasion gift, or a gift for Seniors.  This puzzle has also been used for the visually impaired, as the puzzle pieces are extra large.

*Have been used with Alzheimer's therapy patients for family recognition.*  The absolute perfect custom jigsaw puzzle with unlimited possibilities.

For information on Alzheimer's and Dementia puzzle recommendations, please see our article HERE.

If you need help with your questions about your photo resolution, we have an easy-to-use chart HERE.

entry.title: Blank White Puzzle for a Unique Wedding Guest Book - 104 Puzzle Pieces (approx. 16 x 20)
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Guest Book
Price: 29.99 - 34.99 (2 variants)

Blank White Puzzle Pieces come together to form the Perfect Wedding Guest Book or Guest Book for any special occasion. This extra-large bright white puzzle is approximately 16 x 20 inches when completed and will fit beautifully into a standard American Sized frame, as they are proudly MADE IN AMERICA.

Our extra-large piece puzzle is very sturdy and durable, features a bright white covering that will provide enough room for your special guests to leave a nice sized signature. Our 104 piece guest book puzzle has an average piece size of 1.5 x 2 inches.  We do not stock this puzzle without numbering, as they are very challenging to assemble and will automatically hand-number the back of each puzzle.

WRITING ON THE PUZZLE:  There are no special pens needed to sign our puzzles and we highly recommend using a regular ballpoint pen. Sharpies look amazing on the white puzzle pieces, but please stay away from using anything with an ultra-fine or fine point, as these do not work well on puzzle pieces.  Gel pens are not recommended.

Our puzzles are all Made In America with quality standards in mind and are easily framed because of their standard sizes. A wonderful Unique Guest Book Puzzle for every occasion. Perfect for Weddings, Parties, Quincierna's, Bar & Bat Mitzvahs' and Sweet 16 parties!
